PELMO.installeR
  • Reference

    PELMO.installeR

    The R package PELMO.installeR provides a way to install FOCUS PELMO in a standardised way on Linux/Unix systems for use with wine.

    Note

    If you (re)install this package, you will have to (re)install PELMO afterwards.

    Use

    Please refer to the reference.

    License

    GPL
